applicant-name.name: SUZHOU SHICHUN NEW ENERGY TECH CO LTD
苏州世椿新能源技术有限公司

invention-title: Air tightness detection equipment for hydrogen fuel cell assembly
一种氢燃料电池组件的气密性检测设备

abstract.p: A hydrogen fuel cell assembly air tightness detection device disclosed by the present invention comprises a device rack, a device large plate is installed on the device rack, a stock bin assembly, a conveying assembly and a detection assembly are installed on the outer wall of the top of the device large plate, the detection assembly is located on one side of the conveying assembly, and products are conveyed through the right conveying assembly. Then the product is carried to the conveying assembly through the carrying assembly, the product is placed below the detection assembly through the conveying assembly, so that the detection assembly can detect the product, the detection efficiency can be improved through alternate operation of an upper material conveying plate and a lower material conveying plate on the conveying assembly, and after detection is completed, the detection efficiency is improved. Products on the upper material conveying plate are grabbed to the left conveying assembly through the carrying assembly, materials are conveyed through the conveying assembly, and therefore the equipment can achieve automatic feeding, discharging and detection, the detection efficiency is higher, the precision is higher, the integration degree is high, the occupied area is small, and the cost is relatively low.

本发明公开了一种氢燃料电池组件的气密性检测设备，包括设备机架，设备机架上安装有设备大板，设备大板的顶部外壁上分别安装有料仓组件、运送组件与检测组件，检测组件位于运送组件的一侧，通过右侧输送组件输送产品，然后通过搬运组件将产品搬运到运送组件上，通过运送组件将产品置于检测组件下方，使得检测组件能够对产品进行检测，通过运送组件上的上输料板与下输料板交替运行，能够提高检测效率，检测完成后，通过搬运组件将上输料板上的产品抓取到左侧输送组件上，通过输送组件将物料输送，因而该设备能够自动的上料、下料以及进行检测，检测效率更高，精度更高，而且集成化程度高，占地面积小，成本相对较低。
